briefdescription.para: Enum of supported data compression types.
Number of bytes to read in a single call while doing gzip decompression.
Get an instance of this singleton class.

simplesect.para: an instance of this singleton class.

briefdescription.para: Method to convert an integer to a CompressionType object.
Returns the maximum number of bytes needed to compress the given length of uncompressed data.

detaileddescription.para: Depends on compression type. Unknown for gzip.

parameterdescription.para: type of data compression to do (0=none, 1=lz4 fast, 2=lz4 best, 3=gzip). Default to none.

simplesect.para: maximum compressed length in bytes or -1 if unknown.

detaileddescription.para: Returns length of compressed data in bytes.

parameterdescription.para: source of uncompressed data from position.
maximum number of bytes to write in dst.

simplesect.para: length of compressed data in bytes.

parameterdescription.para: if maxSize < max # of compressed bytes or compression failed.

briefdescription.para: Check for existence of AHA3641/2 board for gzip hardware compression.

detaileddescription.para: This will most likely not be used so comment it out.

briefdescription.para: Method to setup use of z library for gzip compression.
Singleton class used to provide data compression and decompression in a variety of formats.

detaileddescription.para:
This class in NOT thread safe when using the gzip deflating and inflating routines.
